security: The document is marked "Background Use Only. Do Not Reproduce", indicating that wider dissemination could compromise internal administrative processes or reveal sensitive personnel matters.
summary: A travel order authorizes Boris D. Tarasoff to travel from Washington, D.C. to Mexico City and return for 90 days to replace a station employee on home leave, with an estimated travel cost of $1400.
summary_one_paragraph: This travel order, dated July 5, 1960, authorizes Boris D. Tarasoff of the FDD to travel from Washington, D.C., to Mexico City for a 90-day temporary duty assignment (TDY). Tarasoff's purpose is to serve as a replacement for a station employee who is on home leave. The mode of travel is by air, and the estimated cost for transportation is $1400.00. The document specifies light state cover and includes a note that it is for background use only and should not be reproduced, further classifying the area under Category A.
title: Travel Order for Boris D. Tarasoff to Mexico City
